name: CARnage (itch) (Faethryn)
description:
Welcome to CARnage, a car based stunt and carnage game.


Controls:

W and S for forward and back

A and D for left and right

Spacebar for handbrake

Goal:

You gain score by running over the enemies walking around the arena, or by jumping off of ramps.

If you ram another enemy before the meter runs out you gain a combo which multiplies your score gain.

If you run out of fuel for 5 seconds you lose, try and last as long as possible.

Fuel use increases overtime to a maximum cap.

Jerrycans will increase their respawn time every time you use one. 

The end goal is getting the highest score possible.

If you have ideas for improvements or feedback, im always open to get some tips!
